reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Kenya PYM Peace building and Conflict Resolution in Marsabit Maikona North-Horr Laisamis and Moyale District

description.narrative: The project targets marginalized pastoralist communities in the Arid and Semi Arid Lands in the Northern parts of the country that has conflicts tensions hatred and competition for the scarce resources. The project will enhance empower and prepare communit ies and groups towards lasting sustainable peace and coexistence of communities based on their face-to-face discussed and debated facts truths concerns and issues towards access and realization of socio-economic justice. Through the participatory aproach l asting peace and reconcialition through people's discussions initiatives and processes on their felt needs will be found.Overall goal is to empower the confliting pastoralist communities in Marsabit County bordering Kenya-Ethiopia in the peace building rec onciliation conflict resolution process good governance and to lobby and advocate for implementation of its findings.Expected Outputs,- Informed communities on peace-building reconciliation and conflict resolution process in the Marsabit county and Kenya-E thiopia border- enhanced inter-community relations and reduced conflicts and tensions at the community levels in the marginalized are,Andersson Emma
